languages.text: "Конечно, Лорд-капитан! Кто именно вас интересует? Чаще всего дело приходится иметь с последователями святого Друза, Эксплораторами, Миссией Касбаллики или, да простит нам Император, Пустотным братством".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, Лорд-капитан! Кто именно вас интересует? Чаще всего дело приходится иметь с последователями Святого Друза, Эксплораторами, Миссией Касбаллики или, да простит нам Император, Пустотным братством".

languages.text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Лорд-капитан! Кто именно вас интересует? Чаще всего дело приходится иметь с последователями святого Друза, Эксплораторами, Миссией Касбаллики или, да простит нам Император, Пустотным братством".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We are commonly dealing with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, Kasballica Mission or, may the Emperor forgive us, Fellowship of the Void."

"Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We are commonly dealing with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, Kasballica Mission or, may the Emperor forgive us, Fellowship of the Void."

"Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We are commonly dealing with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, may the Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

"Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

"Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

languages.text: “没问题，舰长大人！您对哪些人感兴趣？我们最常打交道的人是开拓者、圣德鲁苏斯的追随者、卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团，以及，愿帝皇原谅我们，虚空协联。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: “没问题，舰长大人！您对哪些人感兴趣？我们最常打交道的人是开拓者、圣德鲁苏斯的追随者、卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团，以及，愿帝皇原谅我们，虚空协联。”

languages.text: «¡Claro, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! ¿Quiénes llaman su atención? Por lo general trabajamos con los seguidores de San Drusus, los Exploradores, la misión Kasballica y, que el Emperador nos perdone, la Hermandad del Vacío».
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: «¡Claro, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! ¿Quiénes llaman su atención? Por lo general trabajamos con los seguidores de San Drusus, los Exploradores, la misión Kasballica y, que el Emperador nos perdone, la Hermandad del Vacío».

languages.text: 「もちろんですとも、ロード・キャプテン！どなたに興味がおありでしょうか？聖ドルススの信徒、探検艦隊、カスバリカ聖務団、あるい皇帝のお許しがあれば、虚空の仲間との取引もございます」
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんですとも、ロード・キャプテン！どなたに興味がおありでしょうか？聖ドルススの信徒、探検艦隊、カスバリカ聖務団、あるい皇帝のお許しがあれば、虚空の仲間との取引もございます」

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain! Wer genau interessiert Euch? Unsere Hauptgeschäftspartner sind die Anhänger des Hl. Drusus, die Exploratoren, die Kasballica-Mission und, der Imperator vergebe uns, die Gefährten der Leere."
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain! Wer genau interessiert Euch? Unsere Hauptgeschäftspartner sind die Anhänger des Hl. Drusus, die Exploratoren, die Kasballica-Mission und, der Imperator vergebe uns, die Gefährten der Leere."

languages.text: « Rien de plus simple, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! À qui songez-vous au juste ? Nous traitons régulièrement avec les disciples de Saint Drusus, les Explorators, la Mission de la Kasballica ou, que l'Empereur nous pardonne, la Communauté du vide. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de plus simple, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! À qui songez-vous au juste ? Nous traitons régulièrement avec les disciples de Saint Drusus, les Explorateurs, la Mission de la Kasballica ou, que l'Empereur nous pardonne, la Communauté du vide. »

languages.text: "Hayhay Lord Kaptan! Tam olarak kimi merak ettiniz? Çoğunlukla Aziz Drusus'un müritleri, Keşiftörler, Kasballica Misyonu veya İmparator affetsin, Uçsuz Kardeşliği ile iş yaparız."
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain! Who interests you, exactly? We most often deal with the followers of Saint Drusus, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission or, Emperor forgive us, the Fellowship of the Void."

traits.locale_text: "Hayhay Lord Kaptan! Tam olarak kimi merak ettiniz? Çoğunlukla Aziz Drusus'un müritleri, Keşiftörler, Kasballica Misyonu veya İmparator affetsin, Uçsuz Kardeşliği ile iş yaparız."
